definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: My emissaries would certainly be detained .
sentences.chinese: 我的密使一定會被扣留。

sentences.english: Bond fans are in two camps about On Her Majesty's Secret Service .
sentences.chinese: 對於《女王密使》這部影片，邦德迷們分成兩個陣營。

sentences.english: Louis 15 King send out the secret envoy to investigate this document.
sentences.chinese: 路易十五國王派出密使調查此案。

sentences.english: The privy position in late Tang Dynasty provided opportunities for the eunuch to usurp power.
sentences.chinese: 唐代後期樞密使的設置則爲宦官控制政權提供了機會。

definition: to go abroad as ambassador/to be sent on a diplomatic mission
intelligence gatherer/spy/detective/scout/sound (medical instrument)/long and narrow probing and sampling utensil
call in (one's subordinates)/summon (an envoy of a foreign country) to an interview
